item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Lionel, nice to meet you. -- Organised, curious, initiative, and down-to-earth data analyst with a background in user experience, customer, web, and marketing analytics in the marketing and advertising field. Proficiencies include identifying business requirements or opportunities, planning design experiment, insight mining, machine learning, visualisation, and presenting result-oriented actionable insights to decision-makers. An Agile and Scrum practitioner. Email: lioneltay.yd@gmail.com Github: @lionelcub LinkedIn: @lioneltayyd --
